name: Get PUSHED! D3M0
description:
I might add 4 players, title screen, and how many players 1-4 screen. Made for a game jam.

Punch, Climb, Jump. Do what you have to do to push the other player into the lava and gain some SCORE!

The adjective is to push the other player into the water.

White player= PLAYER1

Blue player= PLAYER2

Arrow keys and WAD

if touching red square Player1=M and Player2=C

Player1= Space to Punch

Player2= E to punch
